p: The 20-μL optimal visual LAMP reaction mixture consisted of 2 μL of Isothermal Buffer 10X, 0.6 mM of dNTPs, 2 mM of MgSO 4, 0.15 mM of HNB, 0.2 M of Betaine, 0.32 U/μL of Bst 3.0 and final concentrations of the LAMP primers equal to 0.2 μM for F3/B3, 0.4 μM for LoopF/LoopB, 0.8 μM for FIP/BIP. 2 μL of DNA template (5 ng/μL) was considered. The visual LAMP protocol was carried out on A. bungii and non-target DNA from frass of An. chinensis, An. glabripennis and C. cossus (Fig. 4).
